subject: Re: Re: Order ID: 111-5031868-2390644
description_text:
I have been unable to use the updated tracking number on the website
provided. Please provide updated shipping information.

Thank you

>> On Sun, Aug 17, 2025, 10:45 PM General and sales enquiries <
>> service@simsonn.com> wrote:
>>
>>> Hi Kyle,
>>> I am sorry for the inconvenience caused.  As per your case, we will be
>>> glad to reship 2 Vam units for you to replace, is it OK?
>>> The damage to the Vam units
>>>  was likely caused by excessive travel and continuous rotation under Speed mode. We recommend setting a reasonable speed range and reducing the vibration intensity—ideally around 50%, and no more than 70%. Also, try to avoid prolonged continuous operation to extend the motor’s lifespan.
>>>
>>> ------------------------------
>>> service@simsonn.com
>>>
>>>
>>> *发件人：* kyle S <generalpatton71@gmail.com>
>>> *发送时间：* 2025-08-18 08:23
>>> *收件人：* service <service@simsonn.com>
>>> *主题：* Order ID: 111-5031868-2390644
>>> Hello,
>>>
>>>  I'm writing to see if we can find a easier solution for both parties.
>>> My Order ID: 111-5031868-2390644 of the 3 vam kit, power supply, and
>>> mounting kit has resulted in two Vam units already malfunctioning. The
>>> third is currently being used. I have already set up a return with Amazon
>>> but haven't shipped my item back yet. Now I can just go through with the
>>> return but I was hoping for just a simple exchange of the malfunctioning
>>> parts or potential paying a slight upcharge for a Vam pro upgrade
>>> potentially.  I just would hate to have to unmount all this from my pedals
>>> and ship it off just to do it again potentially. Please let me know if
>>> there are any options we can pursue besides doing a return and refund with
>>> Amazon.
>>>
>>> Thank you,
>>>
>>> Kyle Simpson
>>> generalpatton71@gmail.com
>>> Generalpatton71@yahoo.com
>>>
>>>

conversations.body_text: Hi kyle S,     You can use 17track to track the shipping status.
